entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 30%
